column2: Cognito Identity Pool Id to used in the web app configuration.
You can ask me for help ordering flowers. Just type "Buy flowers" or click on the mic and say it.
Name of Lex bot to be used in the web app configuration.
S3 bucket where the source is located
Title displayed in the chatbot UI toobar
S3 object zip file containing Lambda custom resource functions
URL of a page showing the snippet to load the chatbot UI as an iframe
CodeBuild project used to configure and deploy the Lex Web UI

Browser origin (e.g. http://mysite.example.com:8080) of an existing site that is allowed to send/receive data and events from the web ui in an iframe setup. This is an optional parameter. If left empty, an S3 bucket will be created to host a sample parent site embedding the webapp as an iframe.
Should start with Alphanumeric. May contain alphanumeric, undescore and dash.
Message spoken by bot when the microphone is first pressed in a conversation
Must conform with the permitted Lex Bot name pattern.
First bot message displayed in the chatbot UI
If set to True, buckets and their associated data will be deleted on CloudFormation stack delete. If set to False, S3 buckets will be retained.

[{u'PolicyName': u'S3GetObject', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u's3:GetObject*'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:s3:::${SourceBucket}/${SourceObject}'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}, {u'PolicyName': u'S3ReadWrite', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u's3:Get*', u's3:Head*', u's3:List*', u's3:CreateMultipartUpload', u's3:CompleteMultipartUpload', u's3:AbortMultipartUpload', u's3:CopyObject', u's3:PutObject*', u's3:DeleteObject*', u's3:Upload*'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:s3:::${WebAppBucket}', u'arn:aws:s3:::${WebAppBucket}/*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}, {u'PolicyName': u'CloudWatchLogsCodeBuild', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'logs:CreateLogGroup', u'logs:CreateLogStream', u'logs:PutLogEvents'], u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:log-group:/aws/codebuild/${CodeBuildName}', u'arn:aws:logs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:log-group:/aws/codebuild/${CodeBuildName}:*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
Used to configure and deploy the Lex Web UI
Alphanumeric followed by a colum and ending with a hex uuid type.

version: 0.1
phases:
    pre_build:
        commands:
            - aws configure set region "$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION"
            - make config
    post_build:
        commands:
            - make sync-website
S3 object zip file containing the project source
URL of the sample parent page

[{u'Name': u'BUILD_TYPE', u'Value': u'dist'}, {u'Name': u'POOL_ID', u'Value': u'CognitoIdentityPoolId'}, {u'Name': u'WEBAPP_BUCKET', u'Value': u'WebAppBucket'}, {u'Name': u'AWS_DEFAULT_REGION', u'Value': u'${AWS::Region}'}, {u'Name': u'BOT_NAME', u'Value': u'BotName'}, {u'Name': u'BOT_INITIAL_TEXT', u'Value': u'WebAppConfBotInitialText'}, {u'Name': u'BOT_INITIAL_SPEECH', u'Value': u'WebAppConfBotInitialSpeech'}, {u'Name': u'UI_TOOLBAR_TITLE', u'Value': u'WebAppConfToolbarTitle'}, {u'Name': u'PARENT_ORIGIN', u'Value': [u'NeedsParentOrigin', u'https://${WebAppBucket.DomainName}', u'ParentOrigin']}, {u'Name': u'IFRAME_ORIGIN', u'Value': u'https://${WebAppBucket.DomainName}'}]
